Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils

Class FhirConverter

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.utils.FhirConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource>
public class FhirConverter extends Object implements org.springframework.http.converter.HttpMessageConverter<org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource>
This is a converter to and from FHIR for SpringBoot applications that are not using the HAPI on FHIR native web server.
